data.title: Dallas Academy of Music & Performing Arts
data.meta_description: Piano, voice, songwriting, and music theory instructor in Dallas, Texas. Seattle-born singer/songwriter/pianist Paul Davis uses his “Crooner” style, blending
data.meta_site_name: Dallas Academy of Music & Performing Arts - Please call us at 833-281-2690 for any questions!
data.text:
Seattle-born singer/songwriter/pianist Paul Davis uses his “Crooner” style, blending Jazz, Latin, R&B, and Gospel to create a spiritual feel good sound that touches your heart and just makes you feel good. With over 25 years of experience, Paul has accomplished every goal he has set before him. Critics always say his voice melts you like butter, it’s so smooth. His musical vision and creativity has given him a life as a lyricist, songwriter, and vocal arranger. He is also a pro band leader, theatrical director, and producer. Paul’s melodic baritone-tenor voice accompanied by his equally smooth piano style is that feel-good vibe you look for in a intimate setting.

Paul’s music academy, Human Harmony, has travelled performing in various venues featuring adults and kids alike. He loves helping people accomplish their dreams and lends his wide background knowledge and tools to assist artist to achieve their goals. Paul has worked with film producer Artists for The Voice. He has performed at major stages and stadiums, and with artists across multiple genres. Paul says his purpose is “to empower people to live an inspiring life through music and the arts”.
